::Havotron::
"Yes I am eager to leave.  But never forget, you are the council, and 
not in control of me in any way. When i am there, I am in control.  
Your, communicator, may allow me to report to you, but any orders i 
do not take well to, and i will destroy this, walkman. GOT IT!"

--- In nbwrpg@y..., gestalt_menasor@y... wrote:
> The council looked in shock as the screen shut down. "Do you 
suspect 
> the Stunticons
> are involved in foul play. I recognized two robots we didnt send, 
and 
> Motormaster
> seemed at a lose of words." 
> 
> "Perhaps." Another added. "But we must deal with that later." He 
> turned his
> chair, and faced Havotron. "You will leave soon, and with you, will 
> go a legend."
> He motioned to Reflector, who unveiled the sheet covering the 
geurny. 
> On it
> was a small portable primitived device. "The humans called it a 
> portable, walk
> man." One of the council Members said. Reflector proceeded to hook 
up 
> a small
> box, to some wires, to the "walk-man", and then started it up.
